data.title: Sheila McNaught
meta_keywords: Agency for Freelance Film and TV crew
data.meta_description: Sheila is a highly experienced Script Supervisor working in Film, TV Drama and Commercials. She has worked in the UK, Luxembourg, France, Belgium, Holland, Germany, Italy, Spain, Portugal, Croatia, Mexico, Morocco, Georgia, Bulgaria, Norway,...
data.text: Sheila is a highly experienced Script Supervisor working in Film, TV Drama and Commercials. She has worked in the UK, Luxembourg, France, Belgium, Holland, Germany, Italy, Spain, Portugal, Croatia, Mexico, Morocco, Georgia, Bulgaria, Norway, Iceland & Dominican Republic. She has specialised in visual effects, multi camera, period drama, action and underwater shoots, script editing, script polishing, with vast experience in theory eyeline, screen direction and producing accurate screen timings. She is comfortable with English, American and European slate numbering. Sheila also has experience in post production as audio director and dubbing director, and in the theatre as associate director. She is musically trained in score-reading and has an excellent ear for languages (fluent in written and spoken French, good German and Spanish). She has followed scripts in numerous languages, including Dutch, Turkish, Persian, Norwegian & Russian. She is diplomatic, calm and focused, with a good-humoured positive attitude. Sheila is a member of BAFTA.
